author: Chan Sek Keong CJ (delivering the grounds of decision of the court):
casename: Shiraz Abidally Husain and Another v Husain Safdar Abidally
coram: Chan Sek Keong CJ; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA; V K Rajah J
counsel: Mirza Mohamed Namazie and Chua Boon Beng (Mallal & Namazie) for the appellants; Gopalan Raman (G R Law Corporation) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Muslim Law/Whether agreement between children of deceased Muslim to honour deceased's wish to distribute part of his estate in equal shares between them as contained in deceased's letter of wishes binding/Whether concession to have dispute over distribution of part of deceased's estate determined in specific manner existing
